lines.text: How about 7AM?
In the morning? Why so early?
Well, you said you needed it by next week. There's a lot of work to be done.
Yeah, but I don't look good until at least 12!
She's your mother. Come on, Matt. Be serious.
I've never been more serious about anything.
Oh my God. She doesn't know, does she?
No.
Are you going to tell her?
Yeah. Maybe. Maybe when you tell me it's never gonna work.
Excuse me.
Yes?
I, uh, got these for my birthday and I wanted to return them.
They weren't your size?
Yeah, I lost a lot of weight.
Why did you come here?
'Cause I had to find out. Why didn't you want me?
Stop that. It doesn't matter.
Tell me!
I was young, it was a mistake!
So I'm a mistake. I've been waiting for my whole life to meet my real mom. And now you're telling me I'm a mistake?!?
I was your age when I had you - my parents forced me to give you away. Matt, I'm sorry!
Sorry doesn't cut it.
